item.title: Laravel Get The Latest Records In Groups
item.description: Preface Today’s project requires the business logic of querying the latest records based on grouping, and I want to use Eloquent to query out and make a record. Realization Table Contents id name user_id value 1 Project 1 61 test 1 2 Project 2 61 test 2 3 Project 3 61 test 3 4 Project 1 61 test 123 Raw SQL is: 1 select * from (select * from project where user_id = :user_id order by id desc) as a group by a.
